bakersfield.neighborhoods: Downtown, The Foothills, Westchester, Oildale, Seven Oaks, College Heights
bakersfield.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and foothills meetings with established Big Book and step-study groups; strong evening attendance.
bakersfield.transitInfo: GET bus service in the city and regional highway access; Meadows Field (BFL) for regional flights.

elk-grove.neighborhoods: Old Town, Sheldon, Laguna Ridge, Franklin, Elk Grove Town Center, Elk Grove Park
elk-grove.meetingHighlights: Rapidly growing suburban meetings in Old Town and new developments; many family-friendly and evening options.
elk-grove.transitInfo: Sacramento Regional Transit and local shuttles; Sacramento International Airport (SMF) nearby.

fresno.neighborhoods: Downtown, Tower District, Old Fig Garden, Woodward Park, Sunnyside, Bullard
fresno.meetingHighlights: Robust schedule centered in the Tower District and downtown, with a mix of large early-morning and late-evening meetings.
fresno.transitInfo: Fresno Area Express buses and regional routes; Fresno Yosemite International Airport (FAT) for flights.

garden-grove.neighborhoods: Historic Downtown, Little Saigon, West Garden Grove, Bolsa Chica area, East Garden Grove, Westmont
garden-grove.meetingHighlights: Numerous community and church-based meetings with a significant Vietnamese/Asian-language meeting presence in Little Saigon.
garden-grove.transitInfo: OCTA buses serve Garden Grove and regional transit to Anaheim and Santa Ana; John Wayne Airport (SNA) and LAX accessible.

los-angeles.neighborhoods: Downtown, Hollywood, Venice, Santa Monica, Echo Park, Silver Lake
los-angeles.meetingHighlights: One of the largest AA communities with meetings across neighborhoods, many specialty meetings, 24-hour groups, and strong newcomer support.
los-angeles.transitInfo: Metro rail and extensive bus networks across LA County; Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) and other regional airports.

moreno-valley.neighborhoods: Sunnymead Ranch, Alessandro Heights, Canyon Crest, March Air Reserve area, Box Spring, Indian Springs
moreno-valley.meetingHighlights: Community-focused meetings serving families and military communities; regular weekend and evening options.
moreno-valley.transitInfo: Riverside Transit Agency and Metrolink connections; March Air Reserve Base and nearby Ontario Airport for travel.

oakland.neighborhoods: Downtown, Lake Merritt, Rockridge, Temescal, Fruitvale, West Oakland
oakland.meetingHighlights: Diverse meetings across neighborhoods with active downtown and Rockridge groups; a hub for Bay Area recovery events.
oakland.transitInfo: BART, AC Transit buses, and regional ferries connect Oakland; Oakland International Airport (OAK) nearby.

oceanside.neighborhoods: Downtown, Harbor Beach, South Oceanside, Mission Pacific, Mission San Luis Rey, Rancho Del Oro
oceanside.meetingHighlights: Beach-area meetings with active morning groups and community center meetings; Spanish-language meetings available.
oceanside.transitInfo: North County Transit District COASTER and bus services; nearby McClellan-Palomar Airport and San Diego International Airport (SAN).

oxnard.neighborhoods: Downtown, Port Hueneme (nearby), Channel Islands Harbor, College Park, East Oxnard, South Oxnard
oxnard.meetingHighlights: Strong community meetings often held in churches and community centers, with active Spanish-language participation.
oxnard.transitInfo: VCTC bus services and regional highway access; Oxnard Airport and proximity to Santa Barbara and Los Angeles airports.

palmdale.neighborhoods: Downtown Palmdale, East Palmdale, West Palmdale, Rancho Vista, Lake Los Angeles (nearby), South Palmdale
palmdale.meetingHighlights: Suburban meetings with strong evening attendance and several newcomer-friendly groups in downtown Palmdale.
palmdale.transitInfo: AVTA transit and regional highway access; general aviation nearby and LAX within driving distance.

pasadena.neighborhoods: Old Pasadena, Playhouse District, Bungalow Heaven, Pasadena Highlands, Arroyo Seco, San Rafael
pasadena.meetingHighlights: Historic and steady meetings in Old Pasadena and the Playhouse District, with strong after-work attendance and speaker nights.
pasadena.transitInfo: Metro Gold Line and local buses; Bob Hope Airport (BUR) and LAX accessible for travel.

rancho-cucamonga.neighborhoods: Victoria Gardens, Etiwanda, Alta Loma, New Rancho, Cypress Village, East Highlands
rancho-cucamonga.meetingHighlights: Family-friendly suburban meetings around Victoria Gardens and community centers with good evening options.
rancho-cucamonga.transitInfo: Omnitrans bus service and Metrolink nearby; Ontario International Airport (ONT) serves the region.

sacramento.neighborhoods: Downtown, Midtown, Land Park, East Sacramento, Old Sacramento, Natomas
sacramento.meetingHighlights: Large and active schedule of meetings across neighborhoods including many lunchtime and evening options; strong service structure.
sacramento.transitInfo: Sacramento Regional Transit light rail and buses; Sacramento International Airport (SMF) for flights.

san-diego.neighborhoods: Downtown, La Jolla, North Park, Hillcrest, Gaslamp Quarter, Point Loma
san-diego.meetingHighlights: Extensive beach-area and downtown meetings with many Spanish-language groups and evening speaker meetings.
san-diego.transitInfo: MTS trolleys and bus network; San Diego International Airport (SAN) for travel.

san-francisco.neighborhoods: The Mission, SoMa, Fisherman's Wharf, North Beach, Castro, Sunset
san-francisco.meetingHighlights: Historic AA community with a dense meeting schedule across neighborhoods, specialty meetings, and strong newcomer resources.
san-francisco.transitInfo: Muni buses and Muni Metro, BART connections across the Bay; San Francisco International Airport (SFO) and Oakland (OAK) nearby.

san-jose.neighborhoods: Downtown, Japantown, Willow Glen, Rose Garden, Alum Rock, North San Jose
san-jose.meetingHighlights: Active meetings serving the tech and university communities, with lunchtime and evening groups downtown and in suburbs.
san-jose.transitInfo: VTA light rail and buses; Norman Y. Mineta San Jose International Airport (SJC) and nearby SFO/OAK for travel.

santa-clarita.meetingHighlights: Family-oriented meetings and growing new groups in master-planned communities; strong weekend recovery events.
santa-clarita.transitInfo: Local transit and Metrolink commuter rail access to LA; nearby Burbank and LAX for flights.

santa-rosa.meetingHighlights: Active downtown and neighborhood groups with a strong emphasis on step study and speaker meetings; many outdoor recovery events.
santa-rosa.transitInfo: Santa Rosa CityBus and Sonoma County transit; Sonoma County Airport and easy access to SFO and OAK.

simi-valley.neighborhoods: Downtown, Santa Susana, Wood Ranch, Sinaloa Lake, Rocky Peak, Sycamore Drive
simi-valley.meetingHighlights: Community and church-based meetings with steady evening attendance and newcomer-friendly options.
simi-valley.transitInfo: VCTC and local transit; proximity to Burbank and LAX airports via highway.

stockton.neighborhoods: Downtown, Lincoln Village, Brookside, Miracle Mile, Weberstown, Spanos Park
stockton.meetingHighlights: Numerous neighborhood meetings with active downtown groups and a regular calendar of speaker meetings.
stockton.transitInfo: RTD buses serve Stockton and regional Amtrak services; Stockton Metropolitan Airport for regional flights.

sunnyvale.neighborhoods: Downtown Sunnyvale, Birdland, Lakewood Village, North Sunnyvale, Sunnyvale West, Ponderosa
sunnyvale.meetingHighlights: Many commuter-friendly meetings and lunchtime groups for the tech workforce; steady evening community meetings.
sunnyvale.transitInfo: VTA light rail and buses; Mineta San Jose International Airport (SJC) nearby.

torrance.neighborhoods: Downtown, Old Torrance, Del Amo, Hollywood Riviera, Southwood, North Torrance
torrance.meetingHighlights: Established South Bay meetings including both morning and evening groups; significant Japanese and Korean community meetings.
torrance.transitInfo: Torrance Transit and LA Metro connections; LAX within a short drive.

vallejo.neighborhoods: Downtown, Mare Island, Glen Cove, South Vallejo, Hiddenbrooke (nearby), Benicia (adjacent)
vallejo.meetingHighlights: Strong waterfront and Mare Island groups with evening meetings and community outreach to nearby Benicia and Vallejo neighborhoods.
vallejo.transitInfo: SolTrans and ferries to San Francisco; Vallejo Ferry and proximity to SFO/OAK for air travel.

victorville.neighborhoods: Downtown, Mojave Narrows area, Spring Valley Lake, Spring Valley Lake, Hesperia (nearby), North Victorville, East Victorville
victorville.meetingHighlights: Regional desert-area meetings with steady evening attendance; regular weekend recovery events draw attendees from surrounding towns.
victorville.transitInfo: Victor Valley Transit Authority and regional highways; Ontario International Airport reachable by car.

visalia.neighborhoods: Downtown, Mooney, Sequoia Mall area, East Visalia, Visalia Heights, Four Creeks
visalia.meetingHighlights: Small-city meetings with strong community ties, popular evening groups, and active participation from nearby towns.
visalia.transitInfo: Visalia Transit and regional highways; Fresno Yosemite International Airport (FAT) within driving distance.
